general.greeting:
Hi there.
This is an open-source bot to prevent spam in groups
Powered by @ExposedCatDev for UA→CZ groups support

list.allowed:
🟩 Allowed keywords:
${list}
ℹ️To allow a keyword, send it with «+» prefix, for example:
+visa
list.banned:
🟥 Banned keywords:
${list}
ℹ️To ban a keyword, send it with «-» prefix, for example:
-paysend

error.notEnoughRights:
This bot requires rights to delete spam messages automatically.
Add it via Manage group ⇒ Moderator ⇒ Promote to admin ⇒ Delete messages ⇒ OK
